title: New York City's First Lady A Bad Mom ... Or Just An Honest One?
teaser: Chirlane McCray, wife of Mayor Bill de Blasio and mother of two, sparked a controversy recently when she said it took her a while to get used to being a mom. Tell Me More's parenting panel weighs in.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
